meanings.sent2: The chested man lifted the heavy box effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The chested cat proudly strutted around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her chested heart swelled with pride.
meanings.sent5: The chested bird chirped happily in the tree.

meanings.definition: Having a specified type or number of chests.
meanings.sent1: The double-chested cabinet was perfect for storing clothes.
meanings.sent2: He admired the intricately chested design of the antique chest.
meanings.sent3: The treasure hunter found a triple-chested chest full of gold coins.
meanings.sent4: The chandelier had a uniquely chested shape.
meanings.sent5: The chiseled, six-chested statue stood tall in the square.

meanings.definition: Having a chest of a specified kind or size.
meanings.sent1: The large-chested man had a booming voice.
meanings.sent2: She wore a tight-chested armor for protection.
meanings.sent3: The small-chested puppy tried to bark loudly.
meanings.sent4: The wide-chested oak tree provided ample shade.
meanings.sent5: The deep-chested drum produced a rich sound.
